channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Intense rain creates a waterfall in Hong Kong
One Bay restaurants closed, seven get high-priority violations in state inspections
BlackRock's Marchioni on European Assets, CapEx
Toa Payoh fire: 7, including child and fireman, brought to hospital; gunman in Bangkok shooting 'had grudge', Thai police said: Singapore live news
Nigeria kidnappers kill 35 hostages even after ransom paid
Honolulu's lawsuit against fossil fuel companies leads climate change legal fight
item.description: Honolulu is suing major fossil fuel companies, including ExxonMobil, Shell, and Chevron, over climate change impacts

item.title: Employees charged in connection with death and assaults at Alabama jail
item.description: An Alabama jail captain and other jail employees have been indicted in connection with the death of a mentally ill man who died of hypothermia

item.title: Closing arguments set in trial of Colorado dentist accused of poisoning his wife
item.description: Lawyers are set to deliver closing arguments Tuesday in the trial of a Colorado dentist accused of killing his wife by poisoning her

item.title: He heard 'he's got a knife,' then ran to stop a man suspected of stabbing 11 at a Michigan Walmart
item.description: Matthew Kolakowski was shopping with his daughter at a Michigan Walmart when he heard screams and saw a man with a knife

item.title: What to know about the trial of a Colorado dentist accused of poisoning his wife
item.description: The trial of James Craig, a Colorado dentist accused of killing his wife Angela Craig by gradually poisoining her, is winding down
